item.description:
Please join us to hear Judit Price, the author of Your Career and Life Plan Portfolio. Judit is a professional career counselor who has almost 30 years' experience in career transition, career coaching and outplacement. At her firm, Berke and Price Associates, she also offers life planning skills, resume and cover letter assistance, and job search techniques for a diverse population.

In addition, this amazing woman writes a biweekly career and employment-related column for the Lowell Sun Newspaper!

Judit has an MS in counseling, and holds MANY impressive credentials. Judit Price

Remember to bring lots of business cards for networking! Of course, we'll have a raffle, too. Hope to see you there! I know that you'll be really impressed with Judit....
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture on the site.
item.name: Your Career and Life Plan, with Judit Price
